DOC.brief_summary: The first aim study test effect case management evolution therapeutic alliance patient first episode psychosis comparison traditional nursing . The second aim test effect case management nurse ' well-being comparison traditional nursing . The third objective aim show therapeutic alliance associate insight patient clinical demographic data .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Case-management Therapeutic Alliance With First Episode Psychosis Patients ( CAMAT )
DOC.criteria: Age 16 30 year First episode psychosis diagnosis accord DSM5 criterion Lees 16 year 30 year Not fulfil DSM5 criterion first episode psychosis Any treatment psychologist psychiatrist team
